Control

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Control.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class will make all necessary modifications to data in order to send it to the control. It will concern itself with the data of one user and one game at any given point, provided by the Backend.

      • isthereFood

        public boolean isthereFood(int x,
                           int y)
        Determines whether there is food in the selected coordinates (x,y), regardless of food type
        Parameters:
        x - X position in the grid to check if there is food, regardless of food type
        y - Y position in the grid to check if there is food, regardless of food type
        Returns:
        false/true; false if there is no food in the given (x,y) coordinates, true if there is food in the selected coordinates

        Returns:
